description: Keep your camcorder right at hand with Lowepro's Digital Video Case 30. This case is purpose built to protect most compact, high definition camcorders - even models with an extended life battery. Flexible construction allows you to carry it multiple ways. Use the hand strap to grab the case like a camcorder. Detach the hook/loop closure on the hand strap to reveal a wrist strap. Create a belt loop out of the strap. Or place the Digital Video Case 30 into a larger bag - its slim shape and light weight make it convenient for travel. Thick padding with a soft, brushed tricot lining helps safeguard the lens and LCD screen from bumps and scratches. Two interior slash pockets store extra memory within quick reach. An elastic keeper strap secures the camcorder inside the case as it's unzipped. Lightweight, compact and flexible, the Digital Video Case 30 makes it easy to protect and use your video investment - everywhere you go. Available in Black.
title: Lowepro Digital Video Case 30 for Camcorders (Black)
